articles.author: Lawrence Richard
articles.title: Deadly drone attack hits training ground at Syrian base housing US troops - Fox News
articles.description: The U.S.-backed, Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces said a drone strike Sunday on a Syrian base housing American service members left at least six dead.
articles.content:
A drone attack late Sunday evening that struck a military base in eastern Syria, where U.S. troops are stationed, left at least six allied Kurdish soldiers dead, officials said.
The attack hit a tra… [+3933 chars]

articles.author: Andrea Vacchiano
articles.title: US forces launch self-defense strike on Houthis, accuse group of presenting 'an imminent threat' in Red Sea - Fox News
articles.description: The U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) announced that American forces launched a self-defense strike against Houthi forces early Sunday morning, amid tension in the Middle East.
articles.content:
The U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) announced that its forces conducted a self-defense strike against Houthi forces early Sunday morning.
